item.description:
bookcrossers talk about books they like, and where and how to release books, and why bookcrossing is so great.

I changed the venue to the Someday Cafe in Davis Square and the time to 8:00. I'm hoping that more people will be able to make it through the traffic by 8:00 if they are driving. Also the Someday is right out of the Davis Square T stop on the red line.
item.name: Boston Bookcrossing October Meetup
